references.reason: This paper provides technical details on GPT-4, a large language model used extensively in the experiments, making it crucial for understanding the results and the models' capabilities.

references.paper_title: TextWorld: A learning environment for text-based games
references.reason: This paper introduces TextWorld, a platform used in some of the evaluation tasks, hence fundamental to understanding the experimental setup.

references.paper_title: Monte-Carlo tree search: A new framework for game AI
references.reason: This work details Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS), a core algorithm used as a benchmark against LLMs in the GTBENCH evaluation.

references.paper_title: The emergence of cooperation among egoists
references.reason: This paper introduces the Tit-for-Tat strategy, a benchmark agent used in the GTBENCH evaluation alongside LLMs for comparative analysis.

references.paper_title: Chain-of-thought prompting elicits reasoning in large language models
references.reason: This paper introduces Chain-of-Thought prompting, a key reasoning method used and analyzed in the experiments, influencing the results and interpretation.
